message.body: How's was the beach?
It was so much fun. There were so many people there too. I think it was senior week.
How was the fam reunion?
U were pretending u were still in high school?
Hahahhahahha no I behaved myself. I can't party with the youngins anymore. They are entertaining as hell to watch tho
Yea u tell in me. I gotta beach for 4 days. I'm like that two days too many for me now lol Ur 25 now?
Beach House *
Haha yup 25. Getting old
You're like 30 now right?? ;) jk
Yup 27. I met u when I was 15 =-O
Awww that feels so long ago lol
it was lol. A lifetime ago! Been a long time since I saw u last too. Think I was 23
Yeah it's def been a few years. I came down to 'danayunk' to see you I think
Yea back when Harr was dating Amy. Remember harrs sister got in a car accident and the pizza man came but no one was there to pay. I got black listed because of that lol
Hahahahahha that's hilarious. I forgot about that
I mean the blacklisted part. Not the accident obviously
Amy was the Asian girl right?
Ohhhh yeah. I forgot about her
Aww. Yea I never talked to her again after they broke up. Who's the Asian girl?
I dunno. I thought there was an Asian girl there one time. I could be wrong tho
Maybe u met toms Gf? She's like only Asian girl I know
How long u been back in lansdale
Hahaha maybe it was her then. And I moved back up here June 2011
Oh damn u been back for awhile. You've been done school that long?
Yeah. Graduated 2010
dam been savin lots at home? So Ur gonna commute to Lansdale from danayunk then?
Yeah to fort Washington actually
I did that for my first job out of college. Worked at Prudential. Worked in dresher. Not too bad of a commute
Ok good. It didn't seem too bad, but I was hoping traffic in the morning wasn't terrible. Then again it's probably worse coming from lansdale to fort Washington
U gonna live with roommates?
Yeah probably a boy and a girl. Both single tho
Is that good? Do u know them?
Yeah I do. And I don't wanna live with a couple, so I wanted single people lil
Yea its always tough with roommate s. I can't wait to get my own place. You know where your apt is yet?
Not yet. Still looking. We have some choices tho. We have a dog moving in too, so that's made it slightly complicated.
Is it yours?
No it's the boy who's moving in. I want to bring my dogs really bad, but it'll never happen. I have a pit and a German shepherd. They're my babies, but n
o one would ever let me have them in a house. So I guess they're gonna stay with my parents
And I'll just have to stop back there to see them everyday after work
What kinda dog Ur roomie have
It's a pit/Rottweiler mix. He's a big baby. He's still decently small tho, so it isn't terribly intimidating
Dam all these big ass dogs. U better hope he takes care of it. I've had roommates that dun take care of there pets. Its terrible and disgusting
Oh no. I've known the boy for about 8 or 9 years now. So I know him well
Oh he's from Lansdale too I guess then
Yeah
